attributes.action: That 'None of the above' be made a valid, counted option on all UK ballot papers
attributes.additional_details: In common with many people in this country I'm dismayed by the collapse in quality of candidates for public office, together with a decline in political standards.  A 'None of the above' option on ballot papers will clearly indicate whether the engaged electorate is satisfied with the options presented by the political parties of the UK at election or in referendum
attributes.background: To mandate the inclusion of the 'None of the above' option on ballot papers for all national votes in UK, and to count and publish the numbers of votes so cast

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325459
